CustomField.formula: CASE ( TEXT(MONTH(TODAY())) &'-'&TEXT(YEAR( TODAY()) ), TEXT(MONTH(Event_Date__c))&'-'&TEXT(YEAR(Event_Date__c)) , Event_Date__c, TEXT(MONTH(Event_Date_2__c) )&'-'&TEXT(YEAR( Event_Date_2__c)) , Event_Date_2__c, TEXT(MONTH(Event_Date_3__c) )&'-'&TEXT(YEAR( Event_Date_3__c)) , Event_Date_3__c, TEXT(MONTH(Event_Date_4__c) )&'-'&TEXT(YEAR( Event_Date_4__c)) , Event_Date_4__c, TEXT(MONTH(Event_Date_5__c) )&'-'&TEXT(YEAR( Event_Date_5__c)) , Event_Date_5__c, null )
CustomField.label: This Month Event Date
